attributes.action: Change the spelling of Salt to Sult.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let's face it, it isn't pronounced "salt" in any place in the country so let's spell it how it's said: Sult!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
